channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Salat Times
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Salat Times

item.title: CVE-2022-2983|2024-08-03T00:52:59.872Z -- unknown -- salat%20times
item.description: The Salat Times WordPress plugin before 3.2.2 does not sanitize and escapes its settings, allowing high-privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
